children.title: Small
children.description: Design based on a UI kit, utilizing pre-designed components.

children.title: Medium
children.description: Your app has around 4-7 key feature screens.

children.title: Large
children.description: Fully custom layout with more than 7 feature screens.

questions.question: What level of UI would you like?

children.title: MVP
children.description: Design based on a UI kit, utilizing pre-designed components.

children.title: Basic
children.description: Partial use of UI Kit + customized design.

children.title: Polished
children.description: Fully customized design.

children.title: Email/icons/Password Sign up
children.description: Ability to log in using Email and password.

children.title: Facebook Sign Up
children.description: Ability to log in using Facebook profile.

children.title: Twitter Sign Up
children.description: Ability to log in using Twitter profile.

children.title: Google Sign Up
children.description: Ability to log in using Google account.

children.title: LinkedIn Sign Up
children.description: Ability to log in using LinkedIn profile.

children.title: GitHub Sign Up
children.description: Ability to log in using GitHub account.

children.title: User Invitation Emails
children.description: Invite a user to try your app.

children.title: Subdomains
children.description: An additional section of your main domain name.

children.title: Custom Domains
children.description: A unique branded name that identifies a website.

children.title: Dashboard
children.description: Your app's control center, where you can manage everything easily.

children.title: Activity Feed
children.description: A real-time stream showing updates and interactions within the app.

children.title: Media Uploading
children.description: Tool to share media content effortlessly.

children.title: User Profiles
children.description: A personalized space within the app for sharing information about oneself.

children.title: Transactional Emails
children.description: Emails that keep users informed about important updates.

children.title: Tags
children.description: Labels to help organize content and make it easy to find.

children.title: Ratings or Reviews
children.description: Sharing opinions and experiences to empower customers.

children.title: Media Manipulation
children.description: Tools to edit and improve media files.

children.title: Searching
children.description: System designed search through in the app.

children.title: Calendaring
children.description: Plan events and stay organized with an integrated calendar feature.

children.title: Display of Map Data
children.description: Display locations seamlessly through interactive maps.

children.title: Geolocation
children.description: Pinpoint exact location or find nearby points of interest effortlessly.

children.title: Bookings
children.description: Easily book services with streamlined functionality.

children.title: Messaging
children.description: Communicate with app users through messaging.

children.title: Forums or Commenting
children.description: Engage in discussions and leave comments on forums.

children.title: Social Sharing
children.description: Share content easily across various social media platforms.

children.title: Push to Facebook Open Graph
children.description: Integrate and share app activities on Facebook.

children.title: Push Notifications
children.description: Stay informed with timely updates and notifications pushed to device.

children.title: Subscription Plans
children.description: Charge your subscribers, setup automatic renewals and trials.

children.title: Shopping Cart
children.description: Enables you to select and review items, and complete purchases.

children.title: User Marketplace
children.description: Allows users to buy and sell a variety of items within your app.

children.title: In-App Purchasing
children.description: Users can effortlessly make purchases directly from your app.

children.title: Payment Information Collection
children.description: Securely store and manage user payment details for transactions.

children.title: Payment Processing
children.description: Ensure secure and efficient handling of transactions within your app.

children.title: Product Management
children.description: Set the strategy, roadmap, and feature definition for products.

children.title: CMS Integration
children.description: Seamlessly manage and update content.

children.title: User Admin Pages
children.description: Gain control over user management and permissions.

children.title: Moderation/icons/Content Approval
children.description: Allow moderation and control of user-shared content.

children.title: Support
children.description: Provide assistance and address user queries.

children.title: Usage Analytics
children.description: Gain valuable insights into user behavior and interaction.

children.title: Crash Reporting
children.description: Receive real-time alerts and insights into app performance issues.

children.title: Performance Monitoring
children.description: Track and enhance your app's overall efficiency.

children.title: Multilingual Support
children.description: Offer your app in multiple languages for a broader audience.

children.title: Connect to one or more third-party services
children.description: Link your app with external services, expanding functionality and features.

children.title: An API for others to integrate with your app
children.description: Enable external parties to integrate their services with your app.

children.title: SMS Messaging
children.description: For direct and instant communication within your app.

children.title: Phone Number Masking
children.description: Enhance privacy and security when exchanging contact info.

children.title: SSL Certificate based Security
children.description: Ensure encrypted and secure communication between users and your app.

children.title: DDoS Protection
children.description: Safeguard your app against Distributed Denial of Service attacks.

children.title: Two Factor Authentication
children.description: Require an additional layer of verification for secure logins.

children.title: App Specific Development
children.description: Customized app that meets unique needs.

children.title: Project Manager
children.description: Benefit from coordination and oversight for your app's specific development task.
